body_html:
@alanhdu I am building on centos7 and setuptools is too old on on centos, the package built as soon as I updated setuptools and installed wheels.

It would be nice if the packaging didn't force an update on setuptools for people running on long term supported distros

It would be nice if the packaging didn't force an update on setuptools for people running on long term supported distros
